generation

Class HorizontalWallBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • generation.OrientedWallBoard
      • generation.HorizontalWallBoard

  • class HorizontalWallBoard
extends OrientedWallBoard
    A wallboard that is oriented horizontally, sitting between two cells in different rows.
    Author:
    Elijah Mas
